TunableList.name: CLAN_DATA
TunableList.description: A mapping from clan to the different types of loots that need to be applied to clan members for clan related operations.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: A reference to a clan for which we are defining a rival clan and the various loots that need to be applied.

Tunable.name: demote_leader_loot
Tunable.description: The loot to apply to the existing leader of a clan when they are being replaced by another Sim.

Tunable.name: find_new_clan_leader_filter
Tunable.description: A reference to a sim filter that will be used to find a sim to make into the clan leader if the clan currently has no leader. It is recommended that the sim filter does NOT create a sim from template to prevent bugs where multiple sims could get turned into leaders.

Tunable.name: information_dialog_loot
Tunable.description: The loot to display clan information in a dialog.

Tunable.name: join_clan_loot
Tunable.description: The loot to apply to a Sim when they join a clan.

Tunable.name: leave_clan_loot
Tunable.description: The loot to apply to a Sim when they leave a clan.

Tunable.name: promote_leader_loot
Tunable.description: The loot to apply to a Sim when they are assigned leader of a clan.

Tunable.name: rival_clan
Tunable.description: A reference to another clan that will be treated as the rival clan for the given key.

TunableTuple.name: LEADER_CHECK_HOUR
TunableTuple.description: The time of day to check for clans without a leader.

TunableList.name: NARRATIVE_TO_ALLIANCE_STATE_MAP
TunableList.description: A mapping of narrative to the clan alliance state it represents. When the clan service detects a narrative change, it will map the active narrative to one of the alliance states and update the UI if needed.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: A reference to a narrative for which the clan service will attempt to update the UI.

TunableEnum.name: value
TunableEnum.description: The clan alliance state that the narrative corresponds to.
